text: [Music]
I think the next president should begin
announce the immediate withdrawal of
American troops from Iraq I think this
will be a very healthy thing for Iraq uh
because the American occupation has not
helped to thing it has not stopped Civil
War it has provoked Civil War it has not
given the Iraqi people security or democ
y it has given them the opposite it has
ruined their country and of course it
has ruined our country too but the most
important thing is for the Iraqis so I
think the next president should announce
the immediate withdrawal and he should
call upon the International Community
the UN the Arab states uh to convene an
international body to uh mediate in Iraq
among the different groups among Shiites
and the sunnis and the Kurds and try to
work out and this is what the United
States did not do try to work out a
compromise solution for the conflicts
among them United States did not try to
work out a compromise solution United
States moved in shock and awe with
enormous Force set the Shiites up in
power mov the sunnis out and created the
conditions for the present Civil War so
uh getting out uh trying to help with an
International Group using our resources
to give food and medicine and restore
clean water and all the fundamental
things that the Iraqis have been
deprived of because of the war in other
words we could been to do do begin to do
constructive things rather continuing
the
[Music]
destruction
